page.title: 17TI CREDA/RUSSELL HOBBS LTD.
page.content: CREDA.T.I. stands for Tube Investments. T.I. is one big company with eight other companies linked to it.Creda, Russell Hobbs and Raleigh are just some of them.Creda produces Microwaves, Washers,Dryers,Cookers and Oven Hobbs and they make 40% of English electrical goods.Every year Creda makes a profit of about 10 million pounds.The Micro- waves are built on licence from Hitachi of Japan. RUSSELL HOBBS. Russell Hobbs is part of T.I.Investments and is situated next to Creda.It employs 500 people, mainly women,who make small electical goods like Toasters and Kettles.Creda and Russell Hobbs have social clubs. Tennis,Cricket,Football,Golf,discos and entertainments for families and children are all organised by the social club committee.
